channel.title: Comments on: WiSSUG “Filegroups: Putting the Pieces Together” Materials
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: gary schultz
item.dc:creator: gary schultz
item.content:encoded:
Good job on the presentation, Jes; I am working on getting my first full time SQL gig. Perhaps I’ll be able to participate a bit in the discussions in the future.

I tweeted it, but you inspired me to begin the blog / gmailacct / sql identity on line to chronicle my re-entry in to all things SQL. I have decided if I want to be a DBA, I have to start again. So, back to the beginning.
